name: rabeqbidva
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c1, w2)))

stmt.origin: eqtrd(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c1, w2), crab(s0, c0, w2), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w2), crab(s0, c1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w2), crab(s0, c1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w2), crab(s0, c1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w2), crab(s0, c1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c1, w2)))

comment: Equality of restricted class abstractions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
